snippet: Mets outfielder Lucas Duda had surgery after breaking his right wrist while moving furniture last month at his apartment in California.
abstract: New York Mets outfielder Lucas Duda undergoes surgery after breaking his wrist while moving furniture at his California apartment.
lead_paragraph: Mets outfielder Lucas Duda had surgery after breaking his right wrist while moving furniture last month at his apartment in California.

headline.seo: Mets’ Lucas Duda Has Surgery After Breaking Wrist
